name: El Salto Falls

From details on the https://www.facebook.com/elsaltonm page and All Trails entry for El Salto, it would seem canyoning would not fall into the 'non-adventure' category. (https://www.alltrails.com/trail/us/new-mexico/el-salto-del-agua-canoncito-trail)

The El Salto del Agua Association, Inc., grants public access to the El Salto del Agua Land Grant for non-adventure recreational activities. ALL PERSONS entering the land are required to 1) report to warden by calling every time 2) provide release of liability and 3) acquire a day or annual pass)
